title: Reader Black
content:
The final cut of Reader will only be sold 50 times (each ZIP file is numbered) – once they are gone, they are gone!

Reader black comes with a full latin character set, uppercase only! An ultra thick black cut with bevelled edges for use at larger point sizes. Perfect for that headline!

Check it out at [http://www.colophon-foundry.org](http://web.archive.org/web/20131019051839/http:/www.colophon-foundry.org/ "http://www.colophon-foundry.org")
author: Colophon-Foundry
